description: Woven Map ⇄ MBTI correspondence (internal-only). Canonical, falsifiable, architecture-stable. Hard firewall on Contact Resonance. All scoring values are HEURISTICS.

rule_A.name: No Axis Left Uncalled
rule_A.description: Every axis receives a best-fit call. No axis returns 'ambiguous' or '???'.
rule_A.rationale: The field can live with being wrong. It can't live with being vague.

rule_B.name: Layer-Based Tie-Breaker
rule_B.description: When score ≈ 0, use Interior Compass hierarchy: Moon first, Saturn second.
rule_B.fallback: If still tied, default toward the more common population tendency.

rule_C.name: Falsifiability Required
rule_C.description: Every call includes a falsifiable expectation that could prove the call wrong.
rule_C.format: If this call is wrong, you would notice: [testable observation]

firewall.name: Contact Resonance Hard Firewall
firewall.description: Sun polarity, Ascendant, Mars, Mercury tempo NEVER influence E/I, T/F, or J/P.
firewall.rationale: These describe presentation and interface, not interior cognition.

interior_compass.description: Internal cognitive motion — MBTI inferred here
interior_compass.note: Sun element → N/S only (perception). Sun modality/polarity EXCLUDED from E/I and J/P.

contact_resonance.description: How others experience the person on contact — NOT MBTI
contact_resonance.firewall: HARD — these signals are tracked but NEVER influence type determination

N/S.note: Sun element used here for perception architecture (not E/I or J/P)

T.geometry: Earth/Air Moon; Saturn dominance; Earth/Air MC

F.geometry: Water/Fire Moon; Venus-Moon harmony; Water/Fire MC
F.scoring: Moon Water/Fire = 1.5; Venus harmony = +0.2; MC Water/Fire = +0.15

notes.firewall: Contact Resonance signals (Sun polarity, ASC, Mars, Mercury tempo) are tracked for explanation but NEVER determine type.
notes.heuristic_disclaimer: All scoring values are heuristics, not empirical claims. This protocol is falsifiable and user-correctable.
notes.osr_protocol: On Self-Report correction: withdraw cleanly, identify firewall violation, name oversight, realign to Moon/Saturn, collapse corrected branch.
